comprehensive_overview: R-Bioconductor Biobase is a foundational R package in the Bioconductor project that provides a base infrastructure for representing and working with biological data in R. It contains core functionalities for representing biological data structures, such as data classes, storage and retrieval mechanisms, and additional metadata.
core_features: Provides core infrastructure for handling and analyzing biological data in R
Defines basic data structures and methods for representing biological data
Supports data storage, retrieval, and manipulation
Includes functions for accessing and managing additional metadata associated with biological data
